pullRequest.title: About us
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Client: I followed the coding and design guidelines.
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context
Adding an about me page for Artemis
Description
Created an about me page that is reachable from the footer and without needing authentication.
Created an json file under resources which will be read from the about me component when it is opened, also adding user photos in the resources page
Created the object structure for reading the json file
Steps for Testing

Open Artemis
On the footer (left) press About Me

Screenshots

commit.message: Removing unaccepted characters from file names

nodes.bodyText:
This looks a bit weird. Why aren't we defining component and data directly? Along the lines of just
path: 'about',
component: AboutUsComponent,
data: {
    authorities: [],
    pageTitle: 'aboutUs',
},
Just out of interest. Why are you doing this with a tap operator here and not in the subscribe part?
Just trying to learn more about rxjs: Why are you doing this here? Is it possible that getProfileInfo sends undefined?

commit.message: Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into about-us
Merge branch 'about-us' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into about-us

nodes.bodyText: Please lazy-load this module OR make this part of another module we already have.
Why do we need two modules? One should be enough? (And only if we end up lazy loading, otherwise this should not be needed at all for a single component.
Is this ordered in any particular order? What about a random order on each pageload?

Code Review:

-Responsive layout
-Module lazy loading
-Man/Woman placeholder
-Delete unused
Merge branch 'about-us' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into about-us
